alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Green Lake, northwestern Fond du Lac, northeastern Columbia and northwestern Dodge Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 645 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Markesan to near Cambria. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ripon, Randolph, Markesan, Green Lake, Cambria, Fox Lake, Manchester, Fairwater, Friesland and Astico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake
